I went back to my room to charge my phone and on\nthe way back, I looked up at the night sky.%K%P
'What a nice night.'%K%P
The constellation Pegasus filled the autumn sky.%K%P
The fall insects played their cool music,\nannouncing the changing season.%K%P
'She can't go home at this hour...'%K%P
Akane might be a goddess, but she's still a girl.%K%P
You couldn't say it's entirely safe.%K%P
'Maybe she should stay the night.'%K%P
Thinking this, I turned my gaze back toward\nthe courtyard.%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
The familiar courtyard hosted an unfamiliar figure.%K%P
It was a girl, bathed in brilliant moonlight.%K%P
Her hair, black as the night, sparkled in the light\nof the moon and the stars.%K%P
Dressed like a shrine maiden, her slender body and \nelegant face were like a painting.%K%P
'You're a goddess, aren't you...?'%K%P
I could tell at a glance.%K%P
This girl was different from Akane, she had an\nentrancing divine beauty that pulled me in.%K%P
She was much more like the goddesses\nI'd seen on TV.%K%P
Hearing my murmur, the girl turned her eyes to me.%K%P
'...Oh? Might you be Sho Narumi?'%K%P
Her voice fell on my ears like the pure ringing\nof a bell.%K%P
'Um... Uh, yes, yes I am.\nMay I ask how you know my name?'%K%P
'I do apologize.\nI am the local earth goddess of\nKannagi, Inori Kamiki.'%K%P
'Thank you for your kind introduction.'%K%P
The local earth goddess...\nThat must mean she's\nsomeone very important.%K%P
'But wait... The local earth goddess?!\nWhat is an earth goddess\ndoing here?!'%K%P
'I have a small errand.\nI have special permission from\nmy boss, so pardon the intrusion.'%K%P
She covered her mouth and gave a small laugh.\nThe gesture seemed to suit her.%K%P
She was worlds apart from a certain collapsing\ngoddess...%K%P
'An errand, was it?'%K%P
I had a feeling that I knew what this was about...%K%P
I had never even dreamed that a goddess might\ncome to Tsubaki Apartments.%K%P
But tonight, a certain guest was visiting.%K%P
'I have business with Akane Tsubaki,\nwhom I know to be here tonight.'%K%P
Yep, I was right.%K%P
'Was it wrong of me to bring her here?'%K%P
'Oh no, but I'm sure she has been a burden.\nAkane tends to wander off when no one\nis looking.'%K%P
The way she put a hand on her cheek and\nsighed was the essence of humility.%K%P
'I don't think she's been a burden.'%K%P
'Is that so?\nI'm glad to hear that.'%K%P
Inori was so gentle. She was very easy to talk to,\nbut in a different way from Akane.%K%P
'Oh, do pardon my going on.\nWould you please show me\nthe way to Akane?'%K%P
'Of course.\nRight this way.'%K%P
I led Inori inside to find Akane.%K%P
'My name is Inori Kamiki.\nIt's a pleasure to meet you.'%K%P
Inori bowed deeply to Maika.%K%P
'Uh... My name is Maika Kunugi.\nThe pleasure is mine.\nSho? Why is there another goddess here?'%K%P
'She wants to talk to Akane, apparently.'%K%P
'Why Akane?'%K%P
She glanced at Akane.%K%P
Akane had turned away, her shoulders slumped as if\nher earlier cheer had never been.%K%P
Inori drew near to her.%K%P
'Akane, I've been looking for you.'%K%P
'...You didn't need to.'%K%P
'You know that's not true.\nYou're my responsibility.'%K%P
'That's not my fault, I never asked you to!'%K%P
'As you have said many times.\nDon't you know you're\ncausing people trouble?'%K%P
'Whatever! I'm just doing what I want!\nI don't have to explain\nevery little thing to you. Go on, go away!'%K%P
Inori's expression hardened at Akane's\n'shoo' gesture.%K%P
Huh?%K%P
One would think goddesses would be able to talk \npeacefully, but it looked like a storm was brewing \nhere...%K%P
'A-Akane. I'm only trying to help you with your\nrehabilitation!'%K%P
'If you really want to help me, then just let me be!\nWhat, are you that bored?'%K%P
'B-Bored? This is my responsibility!\nThis is no game for me!'%K%P
'Oh, I see... You're so pathetic they didn't want\nto give you a real job.'%K%P
'Wrong! Your rehab never seems to end so I can't do\nanything else! Once you're better, I can get on\nwith important patron goddess work!'%K%P
It was like a teacher arguing with a juvenile\ndelinquent...%K%P
I'd thought that goddesses were some mystical,\nelegant beings, different from humans.%K%P
But judging from the back-and-forth happening\nright here, goddesses were no different\nfrom humans.%K%P
'Just shut up already!\nQuit going on about 'rehab, rehab,'\nlike it's the only word you know!'%K%P
'You reeeally are a worthless pain-in-the-butt\ngoddess!'%K%P
Akane was now the angry one.%K%P
'Ugh, a blackout now?!'%K%P
As if responding to Akane's anger, the lights went\noff and sent the room into darkness.%K%P
If Akane went off in this darkness, who knows\nwhat might happen.%K%P
I had to stop this somehow.%K%P
Suddenly, I heard the rustling of cloth and a figure\nleapt up from the dark.%K%P
'Huh? You want a piece of me?!\nYou'd rather me bow and scrape for you!'%K%P
Once my eyes were used to the dark, I could\nsee Inori glaring at Akane.%K%P
Huh, who was this?%K%P
Where did that meek, gentle flower of\nJapanese beauty go?%K%P
I might have been imagining it, but it sounded like\nrain had started to pour down outside.%K%P
'Pshaw! Like I'd ever listen to a dirt goddess\nlike you!'%K%P
'Dirt goddess?!\nOh, it is ON now!'%K%P
'Hah, you're just mad because it's true,\nyou're such a little brat!'%K%P
'Oh, I'm a little brat?!\nYou're the one who throws a tantrum\nevery time you don't get your way!'%K%P
'Shove it, little Miss Conformity!'%K%P
'C-Conformity?!\nI'm going to get you rehabilitated\nno matter what!'%K%P
'Psh! Bring it on, if you think you can handle me!'%K%P
They were starting to sound like children.%K%P
I glimpsed to the side, and saw Maika staring\ndumbfounded at the goddess fight.%K%P
For the time being, if we didn't get things\nsettled down, then the discussion would\ngo nowhere.%K%P
'Um, okay you two... All this shouting at night is--'%K%P
'Look at you, an unemployed\nfreeloading goddess talking like she's\nqueen of the world!'%K%P
'Oh please! I'm free, I don't need to work!'%K%P
'Exactly, that's what the humans call a\nFREELOADER!'%K%P
It was no good. Neither of them would listen to me.%K%P
I might have to get rough, but it looked like it\nwouldn't stop until I got Akane restrained.%K%P
'Now listen up!\nYou two have got to stop this\nfighting, all-- Wah!'%K%P
Unable to see in the dark room,\nI tripped over a chair.%K%P
'Eeek!'%K%P
'Wh-What?! Sho, are you okay?'%K%P
'I'm fine, I just ran into something.'%K%P
I had tripped, but I saved myself from falling\nby grabbing onto something.%K%P
Something soft, and that smelled good...%K%P
'Um... Mmm...'%K%P
I could hear a captivating voice very nearby, and\nstraining my eyes in the dark I made out\nInori's back...%K%P
So... So this softness under my hands...%K%P
'Oh... Sho...!\nPlease, don't squeeze so hard...'%K%P
'What?! Sho!\nWhat are you doing?!'%K%P
'No, wait!\nIt was an accident!'%K%P
'Uhh...\nSho, your fingers are moving again...'%K%P
'Get away from her right this instant, you idiot!'%K%P
'I-I'm so sorry!'%K%P
I should have gotten away from her\nlike Maika demanded.%K%P
But it seemed so wrong to release the blissful\nsoftness that my hands were enjoying.%K%P
'Oh, brave boy Sho! Go get her!\nBut hey, if you're going to do it, really grab on!\nLike this!'%K%P
'Now hold on! What are you doing, Akane?!'%K%P
'Ah! Th-That tickles!'%K%P
'This is a riot to watch!\nAnd Sho is a boy, after all,\nI bet he's enjoying it!'%K%P
And just as Akane said, I would have loved nothing\nmore than to really squeeze.%K%P
It was such a rare opportunity, I really wanted\nto savor the moment.%K%P
'Sho! Hey!\nYou let go of her right now!\nGet away!'%K%P
'Ouch!'%K%P
Just as reason and desire battled it out in my brain,\nMaika's thump on my head helped\nreason win... But it was close.%K%P
